Oriental fruit fly found in Auckland: Legal controls on fruit, vegetable movement in Papatoetoe https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oriental-fruit-fly-found-in-auckland-legal-controls-on-fruit-vegetable-movement-in-papatoetoe/SUGVZFV36BCZDOEHG4DRENN5TE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oriental-fruit-fly-found-in-auckland-legal-controls-on-fruit-vegetable-movement-in-papatoetoe/SUGVZFV36BCZDOEHG4DRENN5TE/ Cherie HowieThe restrictions announced today are expected to last at least two weeks. Sat, 04 Jan 2025 01:20:51 +0000 There are now restrictions on the movement of fruit and vegetables in Papatoetoe, after an Oriental fruit fly was found in a surveillance trap in the South Auckland suburb. Properties within Zone A (red circle) face stricter controls than those in Zone B (orange circle).

Darcy Brewer named as driver who died after crashing into New Plymouth house on Christmas Eve https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/darcy-brewer-named-as-driver-who-died-after-crashing-into-new-plymouth-house-on-christmas-eve/XESXXTLKINCYPLXIPM7FMAYN5Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/darcy-brewer-named-as-driver-who-died-after-crashing-into-new-plymouth-house-on-christmas-eve/XESXXTLKINCYPLXIPM7FMAYN5Y/ A witness described seeing a speeding car overtake a bus before the crash. Fri, 03 Jan 2025 20:50:19 +0000 Police have named the man who died after crashing into a New Plymouth house on Christmas Eve as Darcy Wilfred Brewer, 60.
